archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1400
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a CSR I want to be able to filter on any of the above attributes for a customer so I can find the account, service, order, billing and communication information that is relevant to the customer conversation I am having

properties.value: OOTB, full text search + predefined fillters + advanced filters

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
